CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 3, 1955, pg. 20 reads: "Fete Counsellor - Members of the Vincennes and Orbin Street Block Club gave a buffet dinner party, Aug. 24, in honor of Robert A. Ruffin, counsellor of the Hill City Block Club Association, who is resigning. The club members who gave Ruffin gifts and attended the gathering at the home of Mrs. Rubell Barnes, 2855 Orbin Street, seated left to right, are Marian Brooks and Esther Watkins.  Second row: Mrs. Dorothy Harper, Mrs. Annie Patterson, President Elizabeth Reed, Mr. Ruffin, Mrs. Carrie Foster, Mrs. Luella Bolyar and Theodore Jones Sr.  Standing: Mrs. Isabelle Mitchell, Mrs. Rubell Barnes, Mrs. Bessie Ponder, Sarah Allen, Mrs. Lillian Vaughn, Catherine Tabb, Howard C. McKinney, Yvonne Reed, Lorraine Jones, Maureen Reed and Mrs. Frances Noel."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Vincennes and Orbin Street Block Club members, from left, seated: Marian Brooks and Esther Watkins; second row: Dorothy Harper, Annie Patterson, Elizabeth Reed, Robert A. Ruffin, guest of honor; Carrie Foster, Luella Bolyar, and Theodore Jones Sr.; standing: Isabelle Mitchell, Rubell Barnes, Bessie Ponder, Sarah Allen, Lillian Vaughn, Catherine Tabb, Howard C. McKinney, Yvonne Reed, Lorraine Jones, Maureen Reed, and Frances Noel, posed in home of Rubell Barnes, 2855 Orbin Street for buffet dinner party
